title: SQL sample
content: CREATE TABLE CPI_study_log(  log_id int(10) Not Null,  log_id int(10) Not Null,  begin_time timestamp,   end_time timestamp);    SQL commands   -select more than one column  SELECT column_name1, column_name2 FROM table_name;  -select all columns   SELECT * FROM table_name;-select unique values SELECT DISTINCT column_name FROM table_name;
